turns.speaker: client
turns.text: HI, I would like to order a coffee drink for pickup please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, where would you like to order it from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok and what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A Golden Cold Brew Fog Latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh ok, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, and what type of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just that, but can you please specify to put extra milk in that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And would you like your receipt via text or email?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, your order of a Golden Cold Brew Fog Latte with extra whole milk, large, will be ready for pickup at the Elmwood ave location in about 10 minutes and the receipt will be sent to your email on file

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you as well, have a great day!

items.name: A Golden Cold Brew Fog Latte
